definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: Chinese Export Commodities Fair Museum in close proximity, 12-storey.
sentences.chinese: 中国出口商品交易会馆近在咫尺，楼高12层。

sentences.english: Near the old Merchant Shipping Hall, a boy collects scraps in the rubble.
sentences.chinese: 在老商船会馆附近，一个男孩正在瓦砾堆中拾荒。

sentences.english: Anther important scenery of YaoWan, back side of main building for ShanXi assembly hall .
sentences.chinese: 窑湾另外一个重要景点，山西会馆主楼背面。

sentences.english: The Sir wants to Ren compel guild?
The childe of the white don't understand why you will invest my guild?
sentences.chinese: 白公子，不知您为什么会投资我会馆？

sentences.english: Clan associations, for example, can play a positive role to integrate and settle new immigrants.
sentences.chinese: 宗乡会馆在这方面可以扮演积极的角色。

sentences.english: And, indeed, Zi Fi is a restaurant designed to make the successful businessman feel at home.
sentences.chinese: 子非会馆确实是一个能够让成功商人宾至如归的地方。

sentences.english: Save 1 for your guild test and make a bit back on them if you can in the AH.
sentences.chinese: 救你一会馆作测试一下就回来，如果你能在他们啊。

sentences.english: Particularly, "hot spring fish therapy pools" of the club is a kind of mark for the new trend of times.
sentences.chinese: 会馆内的“温泉鱼疗”，更是一种时代新潮流的标志。

definition: Gongguan or Kungkuan township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
